text: Joseph Kesenge Wandangakongu (4 April 1928 â€“ 19 February 2021) was a Congolese Roman Catholic prelate. He was born in Molegbe. He was ordained to the priesthood in 1957. He was bishop of the Diocese of Molegbe from 1969 to 1997.Diocese of Molegbe Kesenge Wandangakongu died on 19 February 2021 in Gbadolite at the age of 92.Bishop Joseph Kesenge Wandangakongu == References == Category:1928 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Democratic Republic of the Congo Roman Catholic bishops
title: Joseph Kesenge Wandangakongu
